info.title: OCR API
info.description: OCR API to recognzie the SUICA number

post.description:
{"data" : ["item" : [{"char" : "CHAR", "score" : "SCORE"}], "code" : "CODE"}
Where "CHAR" indicates the character recognized by the ocr model," score" indicates the score of each results. For the SUICA number of 17 charater, the data will be an array of 17 elements, each elements contains 10 results with highest scores returns by OCR model
